item.title: August Visitor
item.description: The August Visitor is available online.

item.title: Children's Ministry Update
item.description: Britney Sue The children’s ministry team is working on a plan to safely re-open in person childcare and Children’s Church this Fall.

item.title: Operation Christmas Child
item.description: Can you believe it is already time to start collecting items to fill shoeboxes for Operation Christmas Child?

item.title: Visitor or Bulletin Information
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the October Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, September 20.

item.title: Facebook Live Prayer Time
item.description: During this season of social distancing, we continue a weekly Facebook Live prayer time!

item.title: YouTube Channel
item.description: Several videos have been produced to help in this transition.
